mapper.select: /* 협력 기관 리스트 조회 */ SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNUMBER , COOPE_PAGE.* FROM ( SELECT COOPE.COOPE_SN AS COOPE_SN , COOPE.BZENTY_NM AS BZENTY_NM , COOPE.EXPSR_YN AS EXPSR_YN , COOPE.SORT_NO AS SORT_NO , FILES.ORGNL_FILE_NM AS ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , FILES.FILE_NM AS COOPE_FILE_NAME , REPLACE(FILES.FILE_PATH, '\', '/') AS COOPE_PATH FROM KB_COOPE_INFO COOPE , KB_FILE_INFO FILES WHERE COOPE.ATCH_FILE_ID = FILES.FILE_SN(+) ORDER BY COOPE_SN ASC ) COOPE_PAGE ORDER BY ROWNUMBER DESC

/* 협력 기관 상세 조회 */ SELECT COOPE.COOPE_SN AS COOPE_SN , COOPE.BZENTY_NM AS BZENTY_NM , COOPE.EXPSR_YN AS EXPSR_YN , COOPE.SORT_NO AS SORT_NO , FILES.FILE_SN AS ATCH_FILE_ID , FILES.ORGNL_FILE_NM AS ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , FILES.FILE_NM AS COOPE_FILE_NAME , REPLACE(FILES.FILE_PATH, '\', '/') AS COOPE_PATH FROM KB_COOPE_INFO COOPE , KB_FILE_INFO FILES WHERE COOPE.ATCH_FILE_ID = FILES.FILE_SN(+) AND COOPE.COOPE_SN = #{coope_sn}
